channel.title: What Difficulty Will you play Black Mesa on?
channel.description: I think I'll do hard. Only because I've been waiting so long for this and I figured that will give me the most out of my experience. I usually stick with medium or normal the first time I play a game, but it'll be really interesting trying hard the first time through.

now I am curious

Like if #1 = 10, #2 = 15, #3 = 30, then it would probably select between 10 and 30 on each shot that you make. But I don’t know, honestly.

item.description:
k3nny1550:

Particularly when you have to go up against agrunts. Those are some tough motherfuckers.

Yeah… when I encounter them I usually spam the Tau cannon or the MP5 grenades. That takes them down quickly, and I usually have more than enough ammo for those since I spend about half the game saving them up for opportunities like that.

The MP5 grenade has actually become something of a main weapon for me, actually. It’s kind of funny since I use it probably way too much. Too bad its ammo capacity got nerfed in Black Mesa… that would’ve been fun to carry 10 of those things throughout the game.

item.title: What Difficulty Will you play Black Mesa on?
item.dc:creator: Unforeseen_Physics
item.description:
I actually found myself enjoying HL1 most when playing on hard mode.
It made you more aware of your environment and check out every possibility.

Also, scenery is best experienced when as inaccessible as possible.
We all know that the actual waiting / striving for something creates more excitement than the actual thing itself.
It’s just like Christmas.
So if you just go through BM like some tourist, you’ll not be nearly as thrilled as when having to do a little something for it.

My two psychological cents.
